column1: IoT Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom. Great things never come from comfort zones. A/B Testing Multi-threading Data Pipeline Event Sourcing Event-driven Architecture DevOps Performance Code Review Do what you love and the money will follow. Automation Logging
Quantum Computing Microservices To be the best
column2: you must be able to handle the worst. Content Delivery Network Event Sourcing Firewalls Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it. Load Balancing Monitoring Multi-threading Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication. JWT React A/B Testing I find that the harder I work
column3: the more luck I seem to have.
